You might choose to rock a gruesome or glamorous look this Halloween but fully embracing your character requires mastering your makeup in addition to the perfect outfit PERIOD

Christine Egashira makeup artist from Sephoras Pro Beauty Team explained that part of the fun of Halloween makeup is that it allows you to be something or someone else for a day PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Makeup is so important in developing character that the UW drama department offers the class  Senior Jenn Hill is in the class this quarter PERIOD

 Hill said PERIOD

However while many students are able to visualize their perfect looks they might not know how to execute them or find the right products to achieve the full effect PERIOD

One good place to look for affordable and effective theatricalmakeup products is Champion Party Supply downtown on Denny Way PERIOD

Andrew Jay sales associate at Champion said they offer the two major theatricalmakeup brands Ben Nye and Mehron both of which are reasonably priced PERIOD He estimated that most of the makeup products sold at Champion range from  PERIOD

Hill said that she prefers theatrical grease paints which are carried by Mehron because they are inexpensive and highly pigmented meaning that a little goes a long way PERIOD

Jay recommended a few different products that could be applied to many different costumes including liquid latex and face wax PERIOD

He plans on using the liquid latex for his Halloween costume this year when he will dress up as singer Rihanna 

 he said PERIOD

Jay explained that the liquid latex is paintlike when it goes on PERIOD Once it dries you can mold it to create the desired shape and texture for your look PERIOD Then he suggests using one of the color wheels sold at Champion to finish off PERIOD The wheels come in several color combinations for burns blisters bruises and more PERIOD

Egashira had some tips for bruises as well using products that women may already have in their makeup collection PERIOD

For a black eye she suggested starting with an eye primer and then adding on multiple colors of shadow for a longlasting and realistic look PERIOD If you do not have these products at home she recommended the Sephora Collection Colorful Mono eye shadows in matte green purple brown and black PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

She also said to make sure to add mascara to your lashes for definition PERIOD

Jay said that he expects popicon Michael Jackson to be another common costume this year PERIOD To perfect this look he suggested using face wax to build his unique nose PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

For women looking to be more glamorous Egashira suggested basic looks like the  that could apply to a few different costumes PERIOD

She recommended beginning by applying a neutral eye shadow on top of an eyeshadow primer all over the lid PERIOD Then use a liquid liner or cream liner and apply a basic line across the lash line PERIOD Next mark where you want the tail end of your cat eye to end and make little brush strokes toward the mark to create your desired shape PERIOD

 Egashira said PERIOD 

However for those who want extra help Sephora offers what is called a  lesson so people can simply stop in and learn stepbystep how to perfect this look PERIOD

Another popular costume is the 20s flapper girl with staples like a dark lip color and false eyelashes PERIOD

 Egashira said PERIOD

Her  product for a dark sultry lip color is  lipstick PERIOD For an extra touch she suggested OPI nail polish in 

While all of these products can be found at either Sephora or Champion Party Supply Egashira and Hill said there are products that people have at home that could be used for their costumes PERIOD

Hill said that women could use everyday makeup depending on their character PERIOD

Egashira said products like black eyeliner longlasting red lipstick black eye shadow and mascara are all things that many women have at home that could be used for many different costumes PERIOD

Additionally women can reuse many of the makeup items that Egashira recommended on a regular night out to get more bang for their buck PERIOD

If you are looking for an even cheaper route homemade recipes can be found online at Web sites like allhallowseve.com PERIOD They suggest making fake blood by mixing corn syrup red food coloring and chunky peanut butter to make a blood and gore mixture PERIOD

This Web site also gives tips for oldage techniques Start with baby powder or a lighter allovertheface cover stick then add darker lines for the wrinkles PERIOD After slightly blending the wrinkle lines add another layer of baby powder to the skin and to the hair to add a gray effect PERIOD

If you are considering a look that requires facial hair for example Kanye Wests stubble at the  MTV Video Music Awards this site advises using hair from an old stuffed toy or hairbrush and attaching it by using double stick tape or fake eyelash adhesive PERIOD

If you need inspiration for that perfect costume Sephora launched three Halloween kits that can create three looks in one kit PERIOD The three combinations are a vampirerockstarwitch kit dollfairyangel kit and GreekgoddesspeacockCleopatra kit PERIOD

Sales associates like Jay at Champion Party Supply can also help in finding you a creative makeup look that matches your costume PERIOD
